item.title: Projects
item.description: Flink VIS Vast Challenge 2022 Performed data aggregation, analysis and transformation using PySpark on 1,000 participants status logs Visualized travel journal data using maps, line charts, with filters to present the current traffic condition using Tableau Derived insights on the commute pattern over time and provided suggestions on potential bottlenecks Mar 2023 - May 2023 Deep Convolutional Neural Network For Limit Order Books Implemented a DeepLOB model based on HSI data (replicate the model raised up in the paper https://arxiv.

item.title: About me
item.description: About me I am a master student from Big Data Technology program at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). I have a strong passion for data science. I enjoy the process of deriving insights from massive data. I am a fast learner and always eager to learn new things so that I’m very open to other’s opinions. With a strong foundation in statistics from a Bachelor of Science degree, I embarked on a career as a research assistant in a medical school, where I honed my analytical skills in a healthcare setting.
